title: Let's visit Alice Springs
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Northern Territory - Description and travel

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Social sciences - Study and teaching

description: Episode number 23 of Series "Modern social studies". Alice Springs and the people who live there, shops and amenities, electric power plant, artesian water supply, public services, airport, schools, hospital and flying doctor service. Includes visits to the Hermannsberg Mission, the Royal Flying Doctor Servie. Flynn's Memorial Church and the School of the Air.
